name: Immortals (Guanghui-FU, JasonDQJ)
description:
Magic Calendar In June 1999, weird creatures from the unknown world invaded the magic continent.
Facing the invasion of weird creatures, the various races of the mainland are retreating.
In only 3 months, the mainland fell by 50%.

Magic Calendar In August 2000, a special reconnaissance team found a special relic in the occupied area.
The great magician led a small team to explore the ruins. After exploration, a special magic was discovered at the lowest level of the ruins: the soul reincarnation ceremony. The great magician began to study special magic at the lowest level of the ruins and hoped to defeat the strange creatures with this.

Magic Calendar In June 2001, the mainland was almost completely occupied, and nearly half of the special relics were also captured. The great magician cast a special magic that only completed 90%.
